summary:
- **Notice of Director Share Issuance**: Lodestar Minerals issued 1,133,319 fully paid ordinary shares to Directors Ross Taylor and David McArthur in lieu of 50% of quarterly salary payments (approved by shareholders on 23 May 2025).  
- **No Disclosure Under Part 6D.2**: Shares issued without a disclosure document.  
- **Compliance Confirmed**: Company states compliance with relevant Corporations Act provisions (Chapter 2M, Sections 674/674A) and no excluded information under Sections 708A(7)-(8).  

(Note: No material trading or capital markets impact identified beyond share issuance details.)
